name: CNN
text:
What the CDC actually said was that for 6% of the deaths included in its statistics, “Covid-19 was the only cause mentioned” on the person’s death certificate. 

That means the other 94% were listed as having additional factors contributing to their death. https://t.co/U89gMlj3tl

name: CNN
text: The fact that these people also had an underlying condition does not mean that Covid-19 was not a major reason, or the major reason, that they died when they did. https://t.co/U89gMlj3tl
